citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
.A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00am on May 2,
2024. The inspector spoke with the licensee’s family member who was not comfortable conducting the inspection and
stated the licensee would not be home for several hours. Please contact your inspector with your current hours of
availability
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
This is the first attempted inspection
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
.A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00am on May 2, 
2024. The inspector spoke with the licensee’s family member who was not comfortable conducting the inspection and 
stated the licensee would not be home for several hours. Please contact your inspector with your current hours of 
availability  
 
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
This is the first attempted inspection 
 
 
End Section
